Package voltage.core

Class VoltageCanvas

java.lang.Object
voltage.core.VoltageComponent
voltage.core.VoltageCanvas
public class VoltageCanvas
extends VoltageComponent
An object in which you can custom draw on and accept mouse input

  • Method Details

    • GetBitmapWidth

      public int GetBitmapWidth()
      Gets the width of the bitmap. It can be 2 times as big as the width of the object if it is high density.
      Returns:
      the width of the bitmap.

    • GetBitmapHeight

      public int GetBitmapHeight()
      Gets the height of the bitmap. It can be 2 times as big as the height of the object if it is high density.
      Returns:
      the height of the bitmap.

    • SetSize

      public void SetSize​(int width, int height)

      Parameters:
      width - width of control
      height - height of control

      Set the position and size of this control.
      Overrides:
      SetRect in class VoltageComponent
      Parameters:
      x - leftmost position
      y - top position
      width - width of control
      height - height of control

      Gets the 2D graphics drawing object

    • Clear

      public void Clear()
      Clears the canvas.

    • GetPixelData

      public void GetPixelData​(int[] pixels)

    • GetPixelDataRect

      public void GetPixelDataRect​(int[] pixels, int topX, int topY, int bottomX, int bottomY)
      Retrieves the pixels for a rectangular section of the canvas image.
      Parameters:
      pixels - array of pixels.
      topX - top left corner's x coordinate.
      topY - top left corner's y coordinate.
      bottomX - bottom right corner's x coordinate.
      bottomY - bottom right corner's y coordinate.

    • Invalidate

      public void Invalidate()
      Flags the entire canvas to be redrawn.

    • InvalidateRect

      public void InvalidateRect​(int topX, int topY, int bottomX, int bottomY)
      Flags the a rectangular region of the canvas to be redrawn.
      Parameters:
      topX - top left corner's x coordinate.
      topY - top left corner's y coordinate.
      bottomX - bottom right corner's x coordinate.
      bottomY - bottom right corner's y coordinate.

    • SetHighDensity

      public void SetHighDensity​(boolean bHighDensity)
      Sets the canvas to high density.
      Parameters:
      bHighDensity - set to true if its high density.

    • IsHighDensity

      public boolean IsHighDensity()
      Is this a high density canvas?
      Returns:
      true if high density
